summary: When the Earth is threatened by an evil alien, a group of UN scientists travel to the lost city of Atlantis where they unearth a superhuman mummy named The Golden Bat who is prophesied to help the humans survive this terrible attack.
cast: Shin'ichi Chiba|Osamu Kobayashi|Wataru Yamagawa|Hisako Tsukuba|Emily Takami|Andrew Hughes|Hirohisa Nakata|Kôsaku Okano|Kôji Sekiyama|Yôichi Numata|Keiichi Kitagawa|Keiko Kuni|Yukio Aoshima|Akira Katayama
title: Ôgon batto
